alert.note: Alert for Johnston (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 1:02AM EDT until May 20 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL JOHNSTON COUNTY... At 102 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Smithfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Selma, Four Oaks, Emit, Coats Crossroads and Flowers. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
